title: What do drugs do?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs, Nonprescription
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs - Physiological effect
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs - Psychological aspects

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Drug abuse - Study and teaching

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Study and teaching
description: Examines the good and bad actions of drugs and chemicals on the body, the risks associated with drugs and the dangers of drug abuse. Emphasises that drugs should be respected both for their beneficial qualities and for their potential harm. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
